explains: adj. 谦虚的，谦卑的；（级别或地位）低下的，卑微的；简陋的，没有特别之处的
v. 使谦卑，使感到自惭；（轻易）击败（强敌）

sentences.en: He always makes much of his humble origins.
sentences.cn: 他总是非常在意他卑微的出身。

sentences.en: Thomas has not forgotten his humble origins.
sentences.cn: 托马斯没有忘记他卑微的出身。

sentences.en: His views come from his own humble beginnings.
sentences.cn: 他的观点源自于他卑微的出身。
